alert.note: Alert for Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 3:49PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Madison County through 415 PM MDT... At 348 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles south of Virginia City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ennis, Cameron and Jeffers. This includes Highway 287 between mile markers 24 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall may also lead to minor localized flooding and debris flow down steep slopes. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
